caption.p: Oocyst morphology of E. tenella in the infected experimental treatments. R1g, R3g, and R5g are 1, 3, and 5 g RN/kg diet, respectively, Sacox: 66 mg of salinomycin/kg diet, PC and NC: basal diet with and without coccidiosis challenge, respectively. Magnification under object lens 40× and scale bar 50 µm.
